home.title: Jerash For Oil Field Services | Production Operations & Wireline Solutions
home.description: Excellence in oil field services across Iraq. Production operations, wireline services, well testing, and HSE-focused solutions in Basrah, Erbil & Baghdad.

services.title: Our Services | Production, Wireline & Well Services
services.description: Comprehensive oil field services: production operations, wireline logging, well testing, coiled tubing, and specialized equipment rental across Iraq.

hse.title: HSE Commitment | Safety Excellence in Oil Field Operations
hse.description: Our unwavering commitment to Health, Safety & Environment. Zero-incident culture with certified personnel and rigorous safety protocols.

footer.aboutText: Jerash For Oil Field Services provides comprehensive oil field solutions with an unwavering commitment to safety and excellence.

home.title: Home
home.description: Jerash For Oil Field Services - Excellence in oil field solutions
home.heading: Welcome to Jerash

hero.title: Jerash For Oil Field Services
hero.subtitle: Excellence in oil field solutions with an unwavering commitment to safety

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading provider of integrated oil field services in the region, recognized for our commitment to safety, quality, and innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Delivering exceptional oil field solutions with unwavering commitment to safety, quality, and client satisfaction. Our experienced team and global partners bring rich knowledge to accomplish projects safely and on time.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: HSE is a fundamental element of all our business activities, from the lowest levels to the highest leadership.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Delivering high quality services and accomplishing our clients' projects on time with complete satisfaction.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Commitment to total customer care and ethical business practices in all our operations.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: We believe in teamwork and partnerships as the foundation of our success.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving our systems, technologies, and equipment designs to serve our clients better.

management.title: Management Philosophy
management.content: Our leadership believes in empowering teams through clear career paths, appropriate training, and a culture of accountability. We pride ourselves in offering a diverse work environment where both team and individual contributions are encouraged and valued. The leadership teams have full responsibility to drive our safety culture by ensuring effective implementation of our standards.

slb.name: SLB (Schlumberger)
slb.description: Global technology leader in the energy industry, partnering with Jerash to deliver advanced oil field solutions.

kweti.name: Jerash for Energy Services
kweti.description: Strategic joint venture expanding our capabilities in energy services across the region.
